item.description:
1/11/10 UPDATE on 2010 departures:

* Feb 6-14 departure: SOLD OUT!
* Feb 13-21 departure: SOLD OUT!

Please see details below (for Feb 13-21 departure) or Click Here for complete details and booking information.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Once again, we will be partnering up with the Global Expeditions Club and joining their members from all over the US and Canada on an exciting adventure to Costa Rica!

Join the club on a group tour February 13 - 19, 2010 (with an optional 3d/2n beach extension available) to Costa Rica! This is an exciting 7 day adventure to Central America's most incredible country. This tour is an excellent option for those who wish to see the best of Costa Rica with a group of fun, like-minded adventurers.

Price: $1,399

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

(NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip)

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Space will go very quickly (the Costa Rica club trip that the club put together for Feb 2009 SOLD OUT in just over 2 months) so be sure get your spot early!

Included in the awesome adventure:
* Expert English and Spanish speaking guides and naturalists
* Up close views of an active volcano
* Canyoneering trip
* Rest and relaxation in natural, volcano heated hot springs
* Class 3-4 whitewater rafting
* Boat ride across Lake Arenal
* Scenic horseback ride alone Lake Arenal
* High-wire canopy ride along the roof of the jungle
* Experience of nature at its best
* OPTIONAL: Mt. Biking tour
* OPTIONAL: 3 day / 2 nights at beach

Places Visited: Costa Rica, Arenal Volcano, Monteverde, La Fortuna, Lake Arenal, Rio Toro, Lost Canyon, San Jose, Samara Beach

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This tour is being organized by The Global Expeditions Club. For more information, visit their website or contact them at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

Make Friends. Travel the WorldÂ®
item.name: Costa Rica: Eco & Adventure Group Tour - 7 Days - Feb 13-21, 2010 - TRIP FULL
